text: Lhuis is a commune in the Ain department in eastern France. It is located near Bugey at the southern end of the Jura mountains. It lies between Lyon and Aix- les-Bains, about from each. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Ain department ==References== *INSEE ==External links== * Official site * Tourist office Category:Communes of Ain Category:Ain communes articles needing translation from French Wikipedia
title: Lhuis
